name: Tim Sutton
contribution_description: I focus a lot of my work on development and managing the QGIS infrastructure and trying to help with communications. I also write plugins in Python and help with directing and mentoring the activities of our dedicated QGIS team.

name: Régis Haubourg
contribution_description: I have been a funder for 5 years, then in charge of QGIS community relations at Oslandia, as well as an individual contributor, involved in French QGIS community at OSGEO-FR, and since 2 years an elected member at the PSC.

name: Asociación QGIS Perú
contribution_description: I am Vice President of the QGIS Peru Association and a member of the QGIS Spain Association. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Business Analytics and Artificial Intelligence at the National University of Engineering (Lima, Peru), and I promote technological activities, metrics for the progress and use of QGIS in Peru, as well as the promotion of the use of open-source software in educational institutions (public and private, schools and universities), and in the private sector (environmental, social, health, education, retail). I also provide translation services through Transifex in various languages ​​and participate in support roles at different international events (FOSS4G 2019, QGIS International 2023, FOSS4G 2024, QGIS LATAM 2024, Python Norte 2025).

name: Rosa Aguilar
contribution_description: Translation of user manual (Spanish), documentation of algorithms or new functions in QGIS, supporting QGIS international conference and onborading day ('s-Hertogenbosch). organizing QGIS community day (Machine learning), and developing QGIS plugins.

name: Em Hain
contribution_description: QGIS AU User Group Coordinator, QGIS AU Event Coordination, QGIS AU Email list Admin, QGIS AU Website Contributor

name: Salvatore Fiandaca
contribution_description: QGIS Contributor since 2013. I actively collaborate in the development and growth of QGIS through multiple roles in the community, contributing to both technical aspects and project outreach. As a changelog contributor, I have been collaborating for years in writing changelogs, documenting news and improvements of each release to make information accessible to the community. As an issue tracker moderator, I report bugs, manage issues, and constantly test new versions and master to ensure software quality and stability. As a country user group coordinator, I support the organization of national conferences and coordinate the activities of the Italian QGIS community. As a documentation writer, I spread QGIS knowledge through blog posts, customized courses, and training materials to facilitate software learning. As a translator, I participate in GUI translation through reports and linguistic contributions to improve accessibility in Italian. As a feature request contributor, I have opened numerous feature requests to propose improvements and new functionalities, contributing to the project’s evolution. As a project sponsor, I financially support the QGIS project and have funded the development of new features to enhance the software’s capabilities.

name: Mammoth Geospatial
contribution_description: Mammoth Geospatial has been actively advocating QGIS in Australia and the Pacific for several years, with a focus on QGIS training, support, implementation, and organising community-focused meetup events.

name: Selma Vidimlic Husic
contribution_description: Active QGIS contributor - presenter at conferences, Open Day participant, and creator of documentation update videos for QGIS YouTube.

name: Hefni Azzahra
contribution_description: I write and update QGIS documentation. I explain how to use the software and its features so that users can understand it easily.
